creator: pub.cog@netcourrier.com
text:
<java classname="org.apache.log4j.chainsaw.Main" fork="yes"
      classpath="${javac.dest};${ant.home}/lib/crimson.jar">
</java>

${ant.home}/lib/crimson.jar 

should be replace by var:
jaxp.parser.jar=${jaxp.home}/crimson.jar
in build.properties.sample file since crimson.jar is not present anymore in ant 
1.5.X (it was present in ant 1.4)

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
Done, and instructions also added in build.properties.sample.  Thanks for 
pointing this out.
